reviews.review: Это крутая игра она азартная и но тут надо хорошо думать хорошо стрелять и мне жаль что тут бывают читеры я в принципе читером не буду да и на моём аккаунте есть что терять игра топ!!!
呵呵，垃圾游戏，打一局排位，打了一个小时，最后一句要赢了，四个人把我踢了，我一个小时白打了，这玩尼玛呢，排位乱踢人？？？？？？
It's CS:GO, the definitive edition of a timeless formula. Great maps, great shooting mechanics, great movement.

O jogo em si é bom... mas ainda falta a melhora na otimização do game (ele deveria ser bem mais leve e rodar bem mais liso) e a (chamaria de arrogância) inclusão de um  anti-cheat ÚTIL... deveriam haver penas mais pesadas para jogadores que abusam de assistência imprópia, o que acontece direto nesse jogo.

Today i recieved a 7 day ban after being kicked from a match on purpose because it was filled with hackers and we were not able to surrender, despite a teammate having left, this will be my last ban, as i no longer want to play this game. no other game has ever captured me in its ability to be so tactical. it is a shame to have that ruined by making the players POWERLESS agaisnt hackers and PUNISHING them for trying to no longer have to play against hackers. this game is deeply broken. valve please fix
